itemInfo.itemDesc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vendor or Innkeeper.\n\nâ€» Using Mineral Water on a Garden will slightly increase the amount of available Water Deposit.

item.name: Lump of Raw Sugar
item.desc: When used, the chance of taming a wild horse increases.\nIt can only be used after catching a horse using a Capturing Rope and then moving close to the steed.

item.name: Corn Dough
item.desc:
A product made by Shaking Corn Flour obtained through Grinding together with Mineral Water purchased at a Shop.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Shaking.

- Usage: Exotic Herbal Wine, Soft Bread, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.desc:

item.name: Concentrated Herbal Juice
item.desc: Immediately heals MP/WP/SP by +175.\n- Cooldown: 6 sec\n- It weighs less than normal potion.

item.name: Herbal Juice
item.desc: Immediately heals MP/WP/SP by +125.\n- Cooldown: 6 sec\n- It weighs less than normal potion.

item.name: Concentrated Grain Juice
item.desc: Immediately heals HP by+125.\n- Cooldown : 5 sec.\n- Weighs lighter than normal potion.

item.name: Grain Juice
item.desc: Immediately heals HP by+75.\n- Cooldown : 5 sec.\n- Weighs lighter than normal potion.
